verses.text: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* me not in thy \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w*: neither \w chasten|strong="H3256"\w* me in thy hot \w displeasure|strong="H2534"\w*.
For thine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* stick \w fast|strong="H5181"\w* in me, and thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* presseth me \w sore|strong="H5181"\w*.

\add There is\add* no \w soundness|strong="H4974"\w* in my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of thine \w anger|strong="H2195"\w*; neither \add is there any\add* \w rest|strong="H7965"\w* in my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.\f + \fr 38.3 \ft rest: Heb. peace, or, health\f*

For mine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* are gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: as an \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* they are too \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* for me.
My \w wounds|strong="H2250"\w* \w stink|strong="H0887"\w* \add and\add* are \w corrupt|strong="H4743"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of my \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w*.

I am \w troubled|strong="H5753"\w*; I am bowed \w down|strong="H7817"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*; I \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w mourning|strong="H6937"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long.\f + \fr 38.6 \ft troubled: Heb. wried\f*

For my \w loins|strong="H3689"\w* are \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with a \w loathsome|strong="H7033"\w* \add disease:\add* and \add there is\add* no \w soundness|strong="H4974"\w* in my \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

I am \w feeble|strong="H6313"\w* and \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w broken|strong="H1794"\w*: I have \w roared|strong="H7580"\w* by reason of the \w disquietness|strong="H5100"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
\w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, all my \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \add is\add* before thee; and my \w groaning|strong="H0585"\w* is not \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* from thee.

My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w panteth|strong="H5503"\w*, my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w faileth|strong="H5800"\w* me: as for the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w it|strong="H1992"\w* also is \w gone|strong="H0369"\w* from me.\f + \fr 38.10 \ft is gone…: Heb. is not with me\f*

My \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* and my \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* aloof \w from|strong="H5048"\w* my \w sore|strong="H5061"\w*; and my \w kinsmen|strong="H7138"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.\f + \fr 38.11 \ft sore: Heb. stroke\f*\f + \fr 38.11 \ft my kinsmen: or, my neighbours\f*

They also that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* lay \w snares|strong="H5367"\w* \add for me:\add* and they that \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* my \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* mischievous \w things|strong="H1942"\w*, and \w imagine|strong="H1897"\w* \w deceits|strong="H4820"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long.

But I, as a \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w* \add man\add*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* not; and \add I was\add* as a dumb \w man|strong="H0483"\w* \add that\add* \w openeth|strong="H6605"\w* not his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
Thus I was as a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w heareth|strong="H8085"\w* not, and in whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add are\add* no \w reproofs|strong="H8433"\w*.

For in thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, do I \w hope|strong="H3176"\w*: thou wilt \w hear|strong="H6030"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 38.15 \ft in…: or, thee do I wait for\f*\f + \fr 38.15 \ft hear: or, answer\f*

For I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Hear me\add*, lest \add otherwise\add* they should \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* over me: when my \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w slippeth|strong="H4131"\w*, they \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* \add themselves\add* against me.

For I \add am\add* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* to \w halt|strong="H6761"\w*, and my \w sorrow|strong="H4341"\w* \add is\add* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* before me.\f + \fr 38.17 \ft to halt: Heb. for halting\f*
For I will \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* mine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; I will be \w sorry|strong="H1672"\w* for my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

But mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \add are\add* \w lively|strong="H2416"\w*, \add and\add* they are \w strong|strong="H6105"\w*: and they that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me \w wrongfully|strong="H8267"\w* are \w multiplied|strong="H7231"\w*.\f + \fr 38.19 \ft are lively…: Heb. being living, are strong\f*

They also that \w render|strong="H7999"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w* are mine \w adversaries|strong="H7853"\w*; because I \w follow|strong="H7291"\w* \add the thing that\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add*.
\w Forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me not, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, be not \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me.
Make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* to \w help|strong="H5833"\w* me, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* my \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*.\f + \fr 38.22 \ft to…: Heb. for my help\f*
